tool_description: Creates geofenced areas around specified locations with customizable shapes and buffer distances for location-based targeting.

center_coordinates.description: Array of latitude,longitude coordinate pairs for geofence centers

buffer_distance.description: Buffer distance in meters around each coordinate point

shape_type.description: Geofence shape: circle, square, or polygon

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Provide valid latitude,longitude pairs with latitude between -90 to 90 and longitude between -180 to 180.
Buffer distance out of range: Set buffer_distance between 10 and 10000 meters.
Unsupported shape type: Use one of [circle, square, polygon].
Too many coordinates: Limit center_coordinates array to maximum 500 items.
usage: Provide center_coordinates array and buffer_distance; optionally specify shape_type and geofence_name_prefix. The tool returns geofence definitions with boundaries and metadata.

geofence_ids.description: Array of unique identifiers for created geofences

total_area_sqm.description: Total area covered by all geofences in square meters

geofence_boundaries.description: Array of geofence boundary definitions in WKT format
